item.title: MB ATRON 1635 BY TRD-CC 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 17, 2025

MB ATRON 1635 BY TRD-CC 1.53 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz Atron 1635 by TRD-CC mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a robust and reliable Brazilian Mercedes-Benz truck to the game. Featuring high-quality textures, a fully detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics, this mod enhances the trucking experience. It includes various customization options, multiple chassis configurations, and advanced lighting effects, allowing for full personalization. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for players looking for a durable and immersive Mercedes-Benz truck driving experience.

Credits: TRD-CC

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
